        constructor for G3Model objects
        Parameters:
        width - double - width of canvas
        height - double - height of canvas
        matrixDimX - int - matrix dimension in X direction
        matrixDimY - int - matrix dimension in Y direction
        yesTo3Probs - boolean - shows whether there are 3 or 2 probes in the game.
